DB_URL.description: Get mongodb database url from https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas with database name = mediaFile and collection name = fileBackup.

BOTUSERNAME.description: Enter your bot username without @ and must be lowercase.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Create private channel and enter channel id to monitor files and get user and file data.

CAPTIONLINK.description: Caption when the media link sent is pressed.

WELCOMEJOINBOT.description: Enter a message before the user joins.

MESSAGEWELCOMEBOT.description: Enter a welcome message when a user joins.

CHANNELJOIN.description: Enter group channel ID to identify bots can read logged in users.
